Text.Page:
Hey, . It turns out those pendants Cimen had you collect are actually dwarven amulets.

I want you to take some of them to {@LinkCreature:67#1020$$Adru} at the north gate. We can use them to ward off evil before it even penetrates our precious Poporia.

Paka sent these? Well, I hope they do the trick. Anything to keep the bad guys out, eh?

Thank you, .
